query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'spc_analysis_history' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%lert%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'spc_analysis_history' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%lert%';
